member.name: T:Articy.Api.IsObjectAllowed
member.summary: delegate used to filter objects for the model picker
member.param: the object to check
member.returns: true if the object should appear in the picker, false otherwise

member.name: T:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyInfo
member.summary: This class aggregates information about a single property that is exposed from ObjectProxy

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyInfo.DataSubType
member.summary: The data type of the object

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyInfo.DataType
member.summary: The data type of the object

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyInfo.DisplayName
member.summary: the display name of the property

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyInfo.EnumDisplayNames
member.summary: if the property is an enum, this member is not null and contains an dictionary to look up display names of enum technical names.

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyInfo.EnumValues
member.summary: if the property is an enum, this member is not null and contains an dictionary to look up technical/symbol names for given enum values

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyInfo.GetDisplayNameOfEnumValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Convenience method to convert a value from an enum property (as returned from the get indexer) to its display name of the enumeration.
member.param: the value taken from the object
member.returns: the technical name of the enum value or null if no name exists for the given value.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyInfo.GetNameOfEnumValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Convenience method to convert a value from an enum property (as returned from the get indexer) to its technical name of the enumeration.
member.param: the value taken from the object
member.returns: the technical name of the enum value or null if no name exists for the given value.

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyInfo.IsCalculated
member.summary: Denotes if the property is calculated from other properties.

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyInfo.IsCustomProperty
member.summary: Denotes if the property was introduced by an feature (true) or is a property that is exposed by the object itself (false)

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyInfo.Name
member.summary: the name of the property

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyInfo.ReadOnly
member.summary:
Denotes if the property can be changed. This member is fixed for a property an never changes.
The ReadOnly member of can change its state when the object is claimed. All calculated or synthetic properties are always readonly, some other properties might be readonly to preserve data consistency.

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyInfo.SupportsExpressoScript
member.summary: Denotes if the property can be parsed as expresso-script (only used by text properties)

member.name: T:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy
member.summary: Represents one articy:draft object like it is shown in the articy:draft GUI.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.AddAttachmentToStrip(System.String,Articy.Api.ObjectProxy)
member.summary: Adds an attachment to a reference strip of the object.
member.param: the name of the property of the type
the object that is to be attached at the end of the specified reference strip

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.AddInputPin
member.summary: Adds a new input pin the the object, if it is "connectable" and the count did not have reached its limit.
member.returns: the created Pin object

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.AddOutputPin
member.summary: Adds a new output pin the the object, if it is "connectable" and the count did not have reached its limit.
member.returns: the created Pin object

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.CanBePartitioned
member.summary: Returns true if this object is a togglable partition (can be created or retired). Will return false in case of system folders as those are always a partition and cannot be retired.

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.CanHaveAttachments
member.summary: All articy object types that can receive attachments inside a reference strip return true.

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.CanHaveChildren
member.summary: true for all object types that can have children as visible in the articy:draft navigator tree, otherwise false

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.ClearStrip(System.String)
member.summary: Removes all attachments from the specified reference strip.
member.param: the name of the reference strip type property

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.FindIndex(System.String,Articy.Api.ObjectProxy)
member.summary: Returns the column index of an attachment inside a certain reference strip.
member.param: the name of the reference strip type property
the attachment, whose index is to be queried
member.returns: the index of the specified attachment inside the reference strip

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetAllowedChildrenTypes
member.summary: Returns a HashSet containing all ObjectTypes that can appear as direct children of the given object
member.returns: A HashSet of ObjectTypes of the found types

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetAttachments
member.summary: Returns a list ob ObjectProxy objects, each representing an attachment as can be seen in the articy:draft reference strip of the respective object.
member.returns: a list of attachments or null if the object cannot have attachments

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetAvailableProperties
member.summary: Returns a list of all property names (type string), this object contains.
member.returns: a list of strings containing the names of all properties this object provides

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetAvailableProperties(Articy.Api.PropertyFilter)
member.summary: Returns a list of all property names (type string), this object contains.
member.param: a filter that allows to show only base properties, template properties or all properties
member.returns: a list of strings containing the names of all properties this object provides

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetChildren
member.summary: Returns a list ob ObjectProxy objects, each representing a child as can be seen in the articy:draft navigator tree.
member.returns: a list of children or null if the object is unable to have children

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetColor
member.summary: Returns the object's "Color" property to the specified value.
member.returns: the current value of the "Color" property
member.exception: If the object does not have a Color property, error code ErrorCode.PropertyNotFound is thrown.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetColumnIndex(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the column index of a property with the specified name.
member.param: property name e.g. "DisplayName"
member.returns: the column index

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetDataType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the data type of the property with the specified name.
member.param: the name of the property whose data type is to be queried
member.returns: the data type

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetDisplayName
member.summary: Returns the name the object is typically displayed with in the articy:draft GUI (navigator, tiles/list view).
member.returns: the object's display name or null if the object has no display name

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetExternalId
member.summary: Returns the object's property "ExternalId".
member.returns: the value of the ExternalId property or null if no such property exists for this object

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetFlowPosition
member.summary: Gets the current position of a flow-item object
member.returns: the position

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetFlowSize
member.summary: Gets the size of a flow flow-item object
member.returns: the current size of the object in the flow-view

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetInputPin(System.Int32)
member.summary: returns the input pin with the given index
member.param: the pin index counted from top to bottom, starting with 0
member.returns: the given Pin ObjectProxy object

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetInputPins
member.summary: Returns a list of ObjectProxy objects, each representing an input pin.
member.returns: the list of input pins ordered from top to bottom as displayed in the articy:draft flow editor
member.exception: If this method is called on an non-flow object the error code ErrorCode.ObjectIsNotConnectable is thrown.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetObjectContext(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the context is which this object appears
member.param: Set to true of you are only interested in top-level contexts (only Documents & Locations distinguish between the system folder and a main object)
member.returns: The value from the enumeration that matches the context. If no one matches is returned.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetObjectUrl
member.summary: Gets the Url of the object
member.returns: the absolute object url using the articy:// protocol

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetOutputPin(System.Int32)
member.summary: returns the output pin with the given index
member.param: the pin index counted from top to bottom, starting with 0
member.returns: the given Pin ObjectProxy object

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetOutputPins
member.summary: Returns a list of ObjectProxy objects, each representing an output pin.
member.returns: the list of output pins ordered from top to bottom as displayed in the articy:draft flow editor
member.exception: If this method is called on an non-flow object the error code ErrorCode.ObjectIsNotConnectable is thrown.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetParent
member.summary: Returns an ObjectProxy object representing the direct parent in the object tree as displayed in the articy:draft navigator.
member.returns: the parent object or null if it is the project node

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetPartitionId
member.summary: Returns the Guid of the partition, this object belongs to.
member.returns: the partition GUID

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetPreviewImage
member.summary: Returns the asset that is set as preview image for this object.
member.returns: the asset object, that serves as preview image for this object
member.exception: If the object does not have a PreviewImage property, error code ErrorCode.PropertyNotFound is thrown.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetPropertyInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Queries for extended property infos.
member.param: the name of the property whose information should be returned
member.returns: a class containing information about the property
member.exception: a PropertyNotFound error code may be thrown

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetShortId
member.summary: Returns the object's property "ShortId".
member.returns: the value of the ShortId property
member.exception: If the object does not have a ShortId property, error code ErrorCode.PropertyNotFound is thrown.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetStripElements(System.String)
member.summary: Helper method to request a list of ObjectProxy objects for a property that is a list type.
member.param: the name of the property to query
member.returns: the list of objects specified by the given property

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetStripIds(System.String)
member.summary: Helper method to request a set of object Ids for a given list property
member.param: the name of the property to query
member.returns: the list of object ids specified by the given property

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetStripMap(System.String)
member.summary: Helper method to request a dictionary of objects keyed by their Id for a given list property
member.param: the name of the property to query
member.returns: the dictionary of objects keyed by their id

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetTechnicalName
member.summary: Returns the technical name of the object.
member.returns: the object's technical name or null if the object does not have a technical name

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetTemplateId
member.summary: Returns the template that is set for this object.
member.returns: the ID of the used template or InstanceIdManager.InvalidIid if no template was used or the object is not customizable at all

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetTemplateTechnicalName
member.summary: Returns the technical name of the template that was assigned to this object.
member.returns: the technical name of the object's template or null if no template was set or the object is not customizable at all

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetText
member.summary: Returns the object's property "Text".
member.returns: the value of the Text property

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.GetText(Articy.Api.TextFormat)
member.summary: Returns the object's property "Text" in the given format (Plain, HTML or BBCode)
member.param: The selected output format format
member.returns: the value of the Text property

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.HasColor
member.summary: true if the object has the "Color" property, otherwise false

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.HasDisplayName
member.summary: true for all articy objects that have a display name, otherwise false

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.HasExternalId
member.summary: true if the object has the "ExternalId" property, otherwise false

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.HasPreviewImage
member.summary: true if the tiles view of the articy:draft GUI displays this object with an preview image, otherweise false

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.HasProperty(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the object contains a property with the specified name.
member.param: the name of the property to check
member.returns: true if the object has the specified property, otherwise false

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.HasShortId
member.summary: true if the object has the "ShortId" property, otherwise false

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.HasTechnicalName
member.summary: true for all articy objects, that have a technical name

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.HasText
member.summary: true if the object has the "Text" property, otherwise false

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.HoldsPartition
member.summary: Returns true if the object is used as a partition root.

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.Id
member.summary: the ID of this object

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.InsertAttachmentIntoStrip(System.String,Articy.Api.ObjectProxy,System.Int32)
member.summary: Inserts the specified attachment into the specified reference strip
member.param: the name of the reference strip type property
the attachment object to insert
the new index of the to-be-inserted attachment; 0 means, the attachment becomes the new first (leftmost) attachment moving all other attachments to the right

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.IsConnectable
member.summary: true for all object types that can be displayed (and therefore connected) in the articy:draft flow editor (flow fragments, dialogs, dialogue fragments, jumps and hubs), false for all other types of objects

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.IsCustomizeable
member.summary: true if this kind of object can have a template assigned, false otherwise

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.IsDisplayNameCalculated
member.summary: true if the display name is calculated using the values of other properties and therefore is read-only, otherwise false

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.IsFolder
member.summary: User folders and system folders return true all other articy object types return false.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.IsInContext(Articy.Api.ObjectContext)
member.summary: Method to check if a given object appears in the given context
member.param: The context to check for
member.returns: true if the object appears in the given context, false otherwise

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.IsInDocumentContext
member.summary: Checks if the given object resides in a hierarchy under a Document object
member.returns: true if the object is a child of a Document, false otherwise

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.IsInFlowContext
member.summary: Checks if the given object resides in the flow
member.returns: true if the object is a child of the Flow, false otherwise

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.IsInLocationContext
member.summary: Checks if the given object resides in a hierarchy under a Location object
member.returns: true if the object is a child of a Location, false otherwise

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Determines if the object can be written.

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.IsSystemFolder
member.summary: System folders return true all other articy object types return false.

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.IsUserFolder
member.summary: User folders return true all other articy object types return false.

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.IsValid
member.summary: true if the object is a valid object with all properties and functionalities, false if it is a so-called 'broken reference'

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.IsValidExpressoScript(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given string is a valid value for the property "Expression" of the object
member.param: the new text
member.returns: true if the string is valid or expresso script support is disabled for the project, false otherwise

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.IsValidExpressoScript(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given string is a valid value for the named property (either object or feature property name) of the object
member.param: the name of the property to check
the new text
member.returns: true if the string is valid or expresso script support is disabled for the project, false otherwise

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: This indexer returns the property with the specified column index.
member.param: the index of the requested property's column
member.returns: The type of the return value depends on the type of property requested.

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.Item(System.String)
member.summary: This indexer returns the property with the specified property/column name.
member.param: name of the requested property e.g. "DisplayName" or "Text"
member.returns: The type of the return value depends on the type of property requested.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.MayAddAttachmentToStrip(System.String,Articy.Api.ObjectProxy)
member.summary: Checks if an attachment is allowed to be added to a reference strip of the object.
member.param: the name of the property of the type
the object that is to be attached at the end of the specified reference strip
member.returns: True if adding is allowed.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.MayInsertAttachmentIntoStrip(System.String,Articy.Api.ObjectProxy,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if the specified attachment is allowed to by inserted into the specified reference strip
member.param: the name of the reference strip type property
the attachment object to insert
the new index of the to-be-inserted attachment; 0 means, the attachment becomes the new first (leftmost) attachment moving all other attachments to the right
member.returns: True if inserting is allowed.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.MaySetObjectReference(System.String,Articy.Api.ObjectProxy)
member.summary: A helper method to check if a given object can be assigned to the object slot with the given property name
member.param: the name of the (slot) property field to set
the value to check

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.ObjectType
member.summary: This property tells, what type the encapsulated articy object really is.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.RemoveAttachmentFromStrip(System.String,Articy.Api.ObjectProxy)
member.summary: Removes the specified attachment from the specified reference strip.
member.param: the name of the reference strip type property
the articy object that is to be removed from the reference strip

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.RemoveAttachmentFromStripAtIndex(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the specified attachment from the specified reference strip.
member.param: the name of the reference strip type property
the index of the object inside the reference strip

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.RemoveInputPin(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the given input pin of the, if it is "connectable", the index is in range the pin is not the last one.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.RemoveOutputPin(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the given output pin of the, if it is "connectable", the index is in range the pin is not the last one.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.RunQuery(System.String)
member.summary: Searches the opened project for articy objects. The object on which this query is executed can be referenced by the "self" query keyword
member.param: A string containing the query expression. See the "ArticyDraft API-Programmer's Guide.pdf" chapter 4 for details.
member.returns: a ResultSet object containing one row for every found articy object

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.SetColor(System.Windows.Media.Color)
member.summary: Sets the object's "Color" property to the specified value.
member.param: the new value for the "Color" property
member.exception: If the object does not have a Color property, error code ErrorCode.PropertyNotFound is thrown.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.SetDisplayName(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the display name of the object to the specified value.
member.param: the new display name that replaces the old one
member.exception: If the object does not have a display name, the ErrorCode.PropertyNotFound is thrown.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.SetExternalId(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the object's "ExternalId" property to the specified value.
member.param: the new value for the ExternalId property
member.exception: If the object does not have the "ExternalId" property, error code ErrorCode.PropertyNotFound is thrown.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.SetFlowPosition(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the current position of a flow-item object
member.param: the x-position of the flow-item
the y-position of the flow-item

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.SetFlowPosition(System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: Sets the current position of a flow-item object
member.param: the new position as Point struct

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.SetFlowSize(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the size of a flow-item object. The given size if coerces to obey min/max size values for an object
member.param: the new desired width of the object
the new desired height of the object

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.SetFlowSize(System.Windows.Size)
member.summary: Sets the size of a flow-item object. The given size if coerces to obey min/max size values for an object
member.param: the new size of the flow item given as Size struct

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.SetPreviewImage(Articy.Api.ObjectProxy)
member.summary: Sets the preview image of this object to the specified value.
member.param: the (image) asset object that is to become the new preview image of this object
member.exception: If the object does not have a PreviewImage property, error code ErrorCode.PropertyNotFound is thrown.
If the new value is no asset, error code ErrorCode.InvalidValue is thrown.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.SetShortId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the object's "ShortId" property to the specified value.
member.param: the new value for the ShortId property
member.exception: If the object does not have a ShortId property, error code ErrorCode.PropertyNotFound is thrown.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.SetTechnicalName(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the technical name of the object to the specified value.
member.param: the new technical name for the object
member.exception: If the object does not have a technical name the ErrorCode.PropertyNotFound is thrown.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.SetTemplate(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a new template for this object.
member.param: the technical name of the new template or null or "" to remove an already set template
set to false if you do not want that the template change also changes the objects color
member.exception: if the the specified technical name belongs to no valid template, ErrorCode.UnknownTemplate is thrown
if the object is read-only, ErrorCode.WriteDenied is thrown
if the object is not customizable, ErrorCode.ObjectNotCustomizeable is thrown
if the the specified template is not allowed for this type of object, ErrorCode.TemplateNotAllowedForObject is thrown

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.SetTemplate(System.UInt64,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a new template for this object.
member.param: the ID of the new template or InstanceIdManager.InvalidIid to remove an already set template
set to false if you do not want that the template change also changes the objects color
member.exception: if the the specified ID is no valid template, ErrorCode.UnknownTemplate is thrown
if the object is read-only, ErrorCode.WriteDenied is thrown
if the object is not customizable, ErrorCode.ObjectNotCustomizeable is thrown
if the the specified template is not allowed for this type of object, ErrorCode.TemplateNotAllowedForObject is thrown

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.SetText(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value of the property with the name "Text".
member.param: the next value for the Text property

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.SetText(System.String,Articy.Api.TextFormat)
member.summary: Sets the property "Text" from a string that has the given TextFormat
member.param: The Text to set;
The text format (Plain, HTML, BBCode)

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.TypeName
member.summary: An untyped string that describes the object type. See for details.

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.ValidateExpressoScript(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given string is a valid value for the property "Expression" of the object.
member.param: the new text

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ObjectProxy.ValidateExpressoScript(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given string is a valid value for the named property (either object or feature property name) of the object
member.param: the name of the property to check
the new text

member.name: T:Articy.Api.ResultSet
member.summary: This object is the container of objects that were found from a query. It is also internally used to cache meta/schema data for all accessed properties from elements in the row collection. This reduces the memory footprint and gives some extra speed when having many object of the same type in the result set.

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ResultSet.Columns
member.summary: the descriptors for the columns

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ResultSet.IdSet
member.summary: the HashSet of all ids returned by this query

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ResultSet.RowMap
member.summary: a Dictionary of all ids/rows returned by this query

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ResultSet.Rows
member.summary: all rows found by the query that has produced this result set
